text: Cortina d'Ampezzo (Ladin: Anpezo, Ampëz, ) is a ski resort and commune in northern Italy. The Olympic Winter Games were held here in 1956. The Ford Cortina, the UK’s best selling car of the 1970’s was named after it. == References == ==Other websites== *Official website Category:Settlements in Belluno Category:Ski areas and resorts in Italy
title: Cortina d'Ampezzo
